Business description: Sinopharm Group Co. Ltd.

Sinopharm Group Co. Ltd. specialises in the distribution of pharmaceutical products and medical devices to hospitals, clinics, pharmacies and third-party distributors. The group also operates pharmacy chains. Net sales break down by activity as follows:

- distribution of pharmaceutical products (71%) ;

- distribution of medical devices (21.7%);

- operation of directly-owned and franchised pharmacy chains (5.9%);

- other (1.4%).

Number of employees: 115,959
